member.name: M:Hangfire.NinjectBootstrapperConfigurationExtensions.UseNinjectActivator(Hangfire.IBootstrapperConfiguration,Ninject.IKernel)
member.summary: Tells bootstrapper to use the specified Ninject kernel as a global job activator.
member.param: Ninject kernel that will be used to activate jobs

member.name: T:Hangfire.NinjectJobActivator
member.summary: HangFire Job Activator based on Ninject IoC Container.

member.name: M:Hangfire.NinjectJobActivator.#ctor(Ninject.IKernel)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a given Ninject Kernel.
member.param: Kernel that will be used to create instance of classes during job activation process.
